t.desc:
Subvalue associated field will contain the Parent portfolio ID in a portfolio is linked as a child
portfolio or will contain the list of Child portfolios IDs for a
parent portfolio.

desc.p: Record ID. Contains 3 parts. delimited by *
3. P or C indicating (Parent or Child)
Multivalue associated. Will hold the Value Date from which the grouping took effect.

t.desc:
Multivalue associated. Will hold the
Date up to which the portfolio was a part of the group.

desc.p: Multivalue associated field will contain values SINGLE/PRORATA/EQUAL. depending on the calculation type.
